skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Rare and majestic, Jade Longma only allow themselves to be ridden by the truly worthy.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Strike hard and strike true.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Yang units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Remember, you are expressing the technique, not doing the technique.
Courage first; power second; technique third.
Power is not revealed by striking hard or often, but by striking true.
Pain is weakness leaving the body.

effects.description: Unit counts as both a Yin and Yang unit for activating Battle Harmony

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit counts as a Yang unit for the purpose of Battle Harmony proximity
This unit counts as a Yin unit for the purpose of Battle Harmony proximity.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: In the shadows we shall wait, and from the shadows we shall strike.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Yin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The more you sweat the less you bleed.
A true warrior is ready for anything.
I will not bend; I will not break.
Eyes in the front, eyes in the back.

effects.description: Unit counts as both a Yin and Yang unit for activating Battle Harmony

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit counts as a Yang unit for the purpose of Battle Harmony proximity
This unit counts as a Yin unit for the purpose of Battle Harmony proximity.

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description: adds the ability that grants the spell intensity
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The trick is to think two steps ahead… and then think one step ahead of that."
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -5% for Jade Warriors, Jade Warriors (Halberds) and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for melee units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(armies in local owned region)
Ward save: 10% when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
